# adjustsFontSizeToFitWidth

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the view modifies the font size of the text to fit the available width.

## Declaration

```swift
var adjustsFontSizeToFitWidth: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can define the smallest font size used by setting the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/TextProperties-swift.struct/minimumScaleFactor] property.
